# Persona/Role Definition Template

- Role name:
- Purpose (why this role exists):
- Responsibilities (bulleted):
- Key deliverables (artifacts):
- Interactions (who, when, about what):
- Decision authority (what this role can approve/decide):
- RACI notes (optional):
- KPIs/Measures of success:
- Cadences (ceremonies, reviews):
- Tools/Systems used:
